prompt: What is the best software for Parsian/Farsi audio-to-text transcription?

hidden_queries: best software for Persian Farsi audio to text transcription Persian speech to text
بهترین نرم افزار تبدیل گفتار فارسی به متن Persian audio transcription software
metadata.generated_search_query: best software for Persian Farsi audio to text transcription Persian speech to text

sources.title: Free Persian Speech to Text | Transcribe Persian Voice and Audio to Text
sources.snippet: Transcribe Persian speech, voice, and audio to text for free with ElevenLabs. Achieve fast, accurate Persian transcription with our world-leading AI technology.

citation_mappings.claim_text: Here are the strongest options for Persian (Farsi) audio-to-text transcription, ranked by accuracy, features, and language support: 1) ElevenLabs Speech-to-Text – high-quality AI transcription that supports Persian. Fast, accurate, and usable for files or voice. ElevenLabs

sources.title: تایپ متنی صوت و تصویر فارسی به صورت آنلاین و رایگان
sources.snippet: به راحتی با استفاده از ابزار گفتار به نوشتار آنلاین Notta، ضبط‌های صوتی فارسی خود را به متن تبدیل کنید. فایل‌های صوتی را بارگذاری کنید، زبان را انتخاب کنید و به صورت خودکار تبدیل نمایید.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 2) Notta – reliable online tool with Persian transcription + translation options and simple editor. Works on web and mobile. Notta+1

sources.title: تبدیل صوت فارسی به متن | TurboScribe
sources.snippet: رونویسی صوت فارسی به متن با مبدل رایگان صوت به متن TurboScribe. نیاز به حساب کاربری نیست. TurboScribe به‌طور خودکار فایل‌های صوتی/تصویری شما را به بیش از ۱۰۰ زبان رونویسی می‌کند.

sources.title: Convert Persian Audio to Text - TurboScribe
sources.snippet: Our free, browser-based tool turns your Persian audio or video into accurate transcripts without downloads or sign-ups. Powered by Whisper—the world’s most accurate and advanced AI speech-to-text engine—TurboScribe supports 100+ languages and handles podcasts, meetings, lectures, interviews, and voice notes with ease.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 3) TurboScribe (Whisper-based) – free & browser-based, uses Whisper engine that’s strong for multilingual ASR (including Persian). Good for long files. TurboScribe+1

sources.title: Persian Audio to Text – Free AI Speech Transcription
sources.snippet: Transcribe Persian audio to text online with Transcribetotext. Our AI-powered Persian speech to text converter quickly turns voice to text in Persian with high accuracy. Perfect for interviews, meetings, and recordings. Fast, secure, and easy to use.

citation_mappings.claim_text: 4) Prismascribe / Maestra / Transcribetotext.ai / Voiser / VMEG AI – several AI web services offering Persian speech-to-text with export options. Accuracy varies but these are useful quick converters. Voiser+4Maestra AI+4PrismaScribe+4
5) Happy Scribe – professional online transcription with human-assisted option (higher accuracy for messy audio). HappyScribe
Notes / alternatives Mobile apps like SpeechTexter or Voice Notes also offer Persian dictation but are less accurate for long recordings. mobo.news
Some general tools (Otter, MeetGeek, Tactiq) may support Persian but quality differs; check language support per plan. fapremium.ir
